00009 module materials
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: setup_material,load_source,load_isotope,compute_totxs
00014 
00015   type :: source_type
00016 
00017     real(8), allocatable :: E(:)      ! energy range for fission source
00018     real(8)              :: cdf_width ! width of cdf bins from 0 to 1
00019 
00020   end type source_type
00021 
00022   type :: thermal_type
00023 
00024     integer               :: kTsize    ! size of kT vector
00025     integer               :: cdfsize   ! size of cdf
00026     real(8), allocatable  :: kTvec(:)  ! vector of kT values
00027     real(8), allocatable  :: Erat(:,:) ! energy
00028     real(8)               :: cdf_width ! width of cdf interval from 0 to 1 
00029     
00030   end type thermal_type
00031 
00032   type :: iso_type
00033 
00034     real(8)               :: N           ! number density
00035     real(8)               :: A           ! atomic weight
00036     real(8)               :: alpha       ! (A-1)^2/(A+1)^2
00037     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_capt(:)  ! capture micro xs
00038     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_scat(:)  ! scattering micro xs
00039 
00040     logical               :: thermal     ! thermal scatterer
00041     type(thermal_type)    :: thermal_lib ! thermal library
00042 
00043   end type iso_type
00044 
00045   type, public ::  material_type
00046 
00047     type(source_type)           :: source        ! the source of neutrons
00048     type(iso_type), allocatable :: isotopes(:)   ! 1-D array of isotopes in mat
00049     integer                     :: nisotopes     ! number of isotopes in mat
00050     integer                     :: curr_iso      ! the current isotope
00051     integer                     :: npts          ! number of points in energy
00052     real(8)                     :: E_width       ! width of energy interval
00053     real(8)                     :: E_min         ! min energy
00054     real(8)                     :: E_max         ! max energy
00055     real(8), allocatable        :: totalxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic tot xs
00056 
00057   end type material_type

00061 !===============================================================================
00062 ! SET_UP_MATERIALS
00065 
00066   subroutine setup_material(this,emin,emax)
00067 
00068     ! formal variables
00069     type(material_type) :: this      ! a material
00070     real(8)             :: emin      ! minimum energy to consider
00071     real(8)             :: emax      ! maximum energy to consider
00072 
00073     ! allocate isotopes array
00074     if (.not. allocated(this%isotopes)) allocate(this%isotopes(this%nisotopes))
00075 
00076     ! set up current isotope index
00077     this%curr_iso = 1
00078 
00079     ! set energy bounds
00080     this%E_min = emin
00081     this%E_max = emax
00082 
00083   end subroutine setup_material

00085 !===============================================================================
00086 ! LOAD_ISOTOPE
00089 
00090   subroutine load_isotope(this,N,A,path,thermal)
00091 
00092     use hdf5
00093 
00094     ! formal variables
00095     type(material_type),target :: this    ! a material
00096     real(8)                    :: N       ! number density
00097     real(8)                    :: A       ! atomic weight
00098     character(len=255)         :: path    ! path to isotope
00099     logical                    :: thermal ! contains a thermal lib
00100 
00101     ! local variables
00102     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00103     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00104     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00105     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00106     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(2) :: dim2         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00107     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size
00108     type(thermal_type), pointer    :: therm
00109 
00110     ! display to user
00111     write(*,*) 'Loading isotope:',this%curr_iso
00112 
00113     ! set parameters
00114     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%N = N
00115     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%A = A
00116     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%alpha = ((A-1)/(A+1))**2 
00117     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal = thermal
00118 
00119     ! open up hdf5 file
00120     call h5fopen_f(trim(path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00121 
00122     ! read size of vector
00123     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00124     dim1 = (/1/)
00125     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00126     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00127 
00128     ! allocate all xs vectors
00129     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat))                  &
00130    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat(vecsize))
00131     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt))                  &
00132    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt(vecsize))
00133 
00134     ! keep the size
00135     this%npts = vecsize
00136 
00137     ! zero out xs vectors
00138     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat = 0.0_8
00139     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt = 0.0_8
00140 
00141     ! read in xs
00142     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_scat",dataset_id,error)
00143     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00144     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00145    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat,dim1,error)
00146     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00147     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_capt",dataset_id,error)
00148     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00149     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00150    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt,dim1,error)
00151     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00152 
00153     ! get energy interval width
00154     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E_width",dataset_id,error)
00155     dim1 = (/1/)
00156     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%E_width,dim1,error)
00157     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00158 
00159     ! check for thermal scattering kernel and load that
00160     if (this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal) then
00161 
00162       ! set pointer
00163       therm => this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal_lib
00164 
00165       ! load sizes
00166       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kTsize",dataset_id,error)
00167       dim1 = (/1/)
00168       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%kTsize,dim1,error)
00169       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00170       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdfsize",dataset_id,error)
00171       dim1 = (/1/)
00172       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%cdfsize,dim1,error)
00173       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00174 
00175       ! read in cdf width
00176       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00177       dim1 = (/1/)
00178       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%cdf_width,dim1,error)
00179       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00180 
00181       ! preallocate vectors
00182       if(.not.allocated(therm%kTvec)) allocate(therm%kTvec(therm%kTsize))
00183       if(.not.allocated(therm%Erat)) allocate(therm%Erat(therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize))
00184 
00185       ! read in vectors
00186       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kT",dataset_id,error)
00187       dim1 = (/therm%kTsize/)
00188       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%kTvec,dim1,error)
00189       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00190       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/Erat",dataset_id,error)
00191       dim2 = (/therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize/)
00192       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%Erat,dim2,error)
00193       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00194 
00195     end if
00196 
00197     ! close hdf5 file
00198     call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00199 
00200     ! increment isotope counter
00201     this%curr_iso = this%curr_iso + 1
00202 
00203   end subroutine load_isotope
00204 
00205 !===============================================================================
00206 ! LOAD_SOURCE
00209 
00210   subroutine load_source(this,source_type,source_path)
00211 
00212     use hdf5 
00213 
00214     ! formal variables
00215     type(material_type) :: this        ! a material
00216     integer             :: source_type ! 0 - fixed, 1 - fission
00217     character(len=255)  :: source_path ! path to source file
00218 
00219     ! local variables
00220     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00221     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00222     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00223     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00224     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size for fission
00225 
00226 
00227     ! check for fission source
00228     if (source_type == 1) then
00229 
00230       ! open the fission source file
00231       call h5fopen_f(trim(source_path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00232 
00233       ! open dataset and read in vector size
00234       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00235       dim1 = (/1/)
00236       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00237       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00238 
00239       ! open dataset and read in width of cdf interval
00240       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00241       dim1 = (/1/)
00242       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%cdf_width,dim1,  &
00243      &               error)
00244       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00245 
00246       ! preallocate vectors in source object
00247       if(.not.allocated(this%source%E)) allocate(this%source%E(vecsize))
00248 
00249       ! open dataset and read in energy vector
00250       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E",dataset_id,error)
00251       dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00252       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%E,dim1,error)
00253       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00254 
00255       ! close the file
00256       call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00257 
00258     end if
00259 
00260   end subroutine load_source
00261 
00262 !===============================================================================
00263 ! COMPUTE_TOTXS
00266 
00267   subroutine compute_totxs(this)
00268 
00269     ! formal variables
00270     type(material_type),target :: this ! a material
00271 
00272     ! local variables
00273     integer                 :: i   ! loop counter
00274     type(iso_type), pointer :: iso ! pointer to current isotope
00275 
00276     ! allocate total xs
00277     if (.not.allocated(this%totalxs))                                          &
00278    &                            allocate(this%totalxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00279 
00280     ! zero out total xs
00281     this%totalxs = 0.0_8
00282 
00283     ! begin loop over isotopes
00284     do i = 1,this%nisotopes
00285 
00286       ! set pointer to isotope
00287       iso => this%isotopes(i)
00288 
00289       ! multiply microscopic cross section by number density and append
00290       this%totalxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt + iso%xs_scat)
00291 
00292     end do
00293 
00294   end subroutine compute_totxs

00301   subroutine deallocate_material()
00302 
00303   end subroutine deallocate_material
